item.title: Nushell, after 8 months
item.description: I have been using nushell as my primary shell for the last 8 months and I don't see myself going back to bash or zsh or powershell
item.dc:creator: Manideep Polireddi

item.title: I am very excited about using nushell everyday
item.description: From the moment I saw the intro video, I found it very appealing. It takes the best of bash and powershell
item.dc:creator: Manideep Polireddi

item.title: Migrating to Dart 3 and null safety
item.description: Dart 3 is here, but we cannot adopt it unless our entire codebase is null safe. Here are few strategies we have been using to slowly migrate our codebase
item.dc:creator: Manideep Polireddi

item.title: Understanding Composition and Side Effects
item.description: Important aspect to any framework that relies on functions is to understand when they are invoked. Read along to get a crystal clear understanding

item.title: Improve your Android build times
item.description: Simple things you can do to improve your gradle/android build time a lot

item.title: RxConfusions - Part 1 : Map and FlatMap
item.description: You probably know what the map operator is. This post discussed mostly about FlatMap and that probably will remove the confusion between map and flatMap operators if any

item.title: Clean way to define support library dependencies
item.description: A cleaner way to define support library dependencies which makes updating their version number a whole lot easier
